title: mRemoteNG sometimes crashes on connection
author: ZJouba
body_snippet:
I can open mRemoteNG without any issues but as soon as I connect to one of my RDP connections, my PC becomes sluggish and after a couple of seconds mRemoteNG crashes.

## Expected Behavior
When I try connect to one of my RDP instances, it should connect.

## Current Behavior
When I connect to one of my RDP instances, mRemoteNG crashes.

## Steps to Reproduce (for bugs)
1. Open mRemoteNG
2. Connect to an RDP instance

## Context
